directions: Toss together cabbage, carrots, scallions, and salt in a large bowl and let stand until cabbage is slightly wilted, about 5 minutes.
Bring vinegar, sugar, ginger, and red pepper flakes to a boil in a very small saucepan, stirring until sugar is dissolved, then pour over cabbage mixture and toss to coat.
ingredients: 1 small head cabbage (2 lb), quartered, cored, and thinly sliced
2 tablespoons finely chopped peeled fresh ginger
1/2 teaspoon dried hot red pepper flakes
title: Hot-and-Sour Coleslaw
